title.narrative: Food security and sustainable livelihoods improvement of vulnerable communities of conflict and drought affected population in Agig Locality, Red Sea State

description.narrative: The clearance of mesquite, construction of earthen embankments and terraces will increase the flow of water into land that will increase moisture content of the soil coupled with distribution of quality seeds and improved agricultural package for farming will result in increase of production of millet and vegetable crops. The distribution of fishing boats and fishing equipment for both fishermen on boats and footer fishermen will increase the catch of fish per fishermen. The provision of refrige

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
